8f157048-7e64-4d34-88a0-a275d9da9f69.name: 能使用超自然能力获得情报

38f4204d-ccd4-42d0-8530-9c8532621490.name: 能使用超自然能力获得情报

fe31ebf4-1d8f-446f-988e-698bc064f1af.name: 健康
fe31ebf4-1d8f-446f-988e-698bc064f1af.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

7bee1472-2449-404b-85a3-72fce159a8f5.name: Fit, Very
7bee1472-2449-404b-85a3-72fce159a8f5.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

cd96ba4a-ba17-4b6f-a7ed-807206e172b0.name: Reaction Bonus
cd96ba4a-ba17-4b6f-a7ed-807206e172b0.notes: Con artists, politicians, salesmen, etc. – but only if you aren’t trying to manipulate them.

8ddf481b-a25d-4a5f-8797-b5294d1b27f2.name: 可选增益
8ddf481b-a25d-4a5f-8797-b5294d1b27f2.notes: 在抵抗天赋对应的技能上获得加值
